query: Which solution is suitable for measuring room acoustics and speech intelligibility in compliance with ISO standards?
response:
The DIRAC system is a suitable solution for measuring room acoustics and speech intelligibility in compliance with ISO standards, specifically ISO 3382-3. It can generate graphs to calculate the distraction distance (rD) and the comfort distance (rC), as well as view and export all parameter values detailed in ISO 3382-3.
